Comment: Abilities: A0PE (Mirror Image), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Creates images of Rend Blackhand to fight enemies and dispels all magic from Rend.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Creates 2 images which deal 50% the damage of Rend and take 250% the damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Creates 4 images which deal 50% the damage of Rend and take 225% the damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Creates 6 images which deal 50% the damage of Rend and take 200% the damage.
